title: [Massive] Risk Screening Strategies for Elementary Science Teachers Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Science Education Experience and Foundational Learning Analytics Concepts
context.additional_context: Strategies for current elementary science practitioners to identify and intervene in learner risks using online learning data

learning_goals: Learners can describe methods to measure effort-based factors (e.g., assignment submission frequency, discussion participation) using learning analytics tools.
Learners can design personalized intervention strategies reflecting dynamic risk factors (e.g., changes in learning patterns, real-time assessment results).
Learners can mitigate ethical issues in at-risk student screening by utilizing personalized statistical sets reflecting individual characteristics from large-scale learner data.

resources: Personal BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Data Collection Tool

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
